title: Handle a Truck Arriving with No Appointment
description: A truck arrives at the gate but does not have a Vehicle Booking System (VBS) appointment. The clerk must handle the exception.

tasks.description: Verify that no appointment exists for the truck's license plate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk confirms in the VBS that there is no matching appointment.

tasks.description: Inform the driver they cannot enter without an appointment and direct them to the truck parking area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk clearly communicates the policy to the driver.

tasks.description: Advise the driver to contact their dispatch to book an appointment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Clerk provides instructions for the driver to resolve the issue.
